title: Robert Syms – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Robert Syms, the Conservative MP for Poole, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
My view is that the best candidate to lead the Conservative Party is Rishi Sunak and I am happy to nominate him for the contest.
